content.question: In the third paragraph (“There . . . tree”), the narrator’s descriptions of light falling through branches and shadows moving across the field primarily serve to

choices.label: suggest that natural cycles can explain the mysteries of life
emphasize a difference between the regularity of nature and the unpredictability of humans
establish a context in which Tom Rivers’ actions will make sense in retrospect
suggest that the family’s property may hold a clue to Tom Rivers’ disappearance

content.answer: emphasize a difference between the regularity of nature and the unpredictability of humans

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
